Futbol.ftdesc: I been an artistic guy since day 1, I guess this of being a designer wasnt that hard to decide thanks to that. Now days I been working on a personal character call The Bear, a wild colombian bear that rides a bicicle, is very left handed and has no filter over what he thinks and said.
